content.rendered:
Orange County

If you are looking to complete your bachelor’s degree or take the next step in your career with a master’s degree, the University of La Verne in Orange County offers flexible schedules that allow you to work full-time as you complete your coursework.

  • Regional and Online Campus (ROC) Expansion Information

Undergraduate Degree Programs

  • Accounting, BA
  • Business Administration, BA
  • Educational Studies, BA
  • Organizational Management, BS
  • Public Administration, BS

Graduate Programs

  • Business Administration, MBA
  • Educational Counseling, MS with PPS credential
  • Health Administration, MHA
  • Leadership and Management, MS
  • Public Administration, MPA
